description:
During a beach trip, the legend of a killer unsurfable wave, along with an old ghost story, are both told, but which will end up more dangerous for Madoka?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La sfida di Madoka! La leggenda della grande onda
Madoka Chousen! Yuurei Kaigan no Oonami Densetsu
Madoka`s Challenge! The Haunted Beach`s Big Wave Legend
まどか挑戦!幽霊海岸の大波伝説
